name: Decay (RobBCreates)
description:
My entry for the May #1Gam game jam. 

This was actually an alteration of Hitman Go style level creator that I've been working on. By adding a decay time to each node which goes from the players start location through to the end node I've added a plague like timer mechanic to the game. 

Controls

LMB - Click on any node directly adjacent to the player to move to that spot. Adjacent nodes are represented by the white nodes.

Aim of the game

Get to the end of the level by moving from node to node. Along the way try to work out the fastest route to collect all of the coins without the node decay catching up with you. 

Credits

Programming, Art & Animation: Rob Brooks
